title: Tobe! Kujira no Peek (Fly! Peek the Whale)
synopsis: The story of an albino whale used in a circus, and the efforts of young children to free him from captivity.
voices: ['Aomori, Shin', 'Dan, Fumi', 'Iizuka, Shouzou', 'Wakamoto, Norio', 'Matsuoka, Fumio', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Ono, Kenichi']
staff: [['Morimoto, Kouji', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Screenplay']], ['Nobumoto, Keiko', ['Script']], ['Inoue, Toshiyuki', ['Animation Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Yaginuma, Kazuyoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
